trans-unit.source: A trigger action that begins a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> and distributes its animations to their targeted objects and properties.
trans-unit.target: Acción de desencadenador que inicia un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> y distribuye sus animaciones a sus propiedades y objetos de destino.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to apply animations to their target properties and start them.
trans-unit.target: Use un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> acción con un <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> para aplicar animaciones a sus propiedades de destino e iniciarlas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> begins a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> reference when triggered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> comienza una <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> en su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> hacer referencia cuando se desencadena.

trans-unit.source: When you begin a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> on a property that is already being animated by another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> determines how the animation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: Al comenzar un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> en una propiedad que se anima ya por otro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> propiedad de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> determina cómo se realiza la animación.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Pausar, reanudar, detener o controlar cualquier otro modo un guión gráfico de forma interactiva

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> that was declared in markup interactively, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.
trans-unit.target: Para poder poner en pausa, reanudar o controlar cualquier otro modo un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> que se ha declarado en el marcado de forma interactiva, debe establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propiedad de su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.

trans-unit.source: You can then control the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, puede controlar la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> mediante el uso de un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) para controlar haciendo referencia a su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> no se especifica, el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> no se puede controlar de forma interactiva una vez que se ha iniciado.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vea [Cómo: utilizar desencadenadores de eventos para controlar un guión gráfico después de que se inicia](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obtener más información.

trans-unit.source: In code, you may use the interactive methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class to control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that was applied using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.
trans-unit.target: En el código, puede utilizar los métodos interactivos de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> clase para controlar un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> que se aplicó mediante un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.

trans-unit.source: As is the case when using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objects, you must give the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> a name for its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to be interactively controllable.
trans-unit.target: Como es el caso cuando se usa <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objetos, debe asignar a la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> un nombre para su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> se pueda controlar interactivamente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proper hand-off behavior to start an animation clock in this storyboard
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el comportamiento de entrega apropiado para iniciar un reloj de animación en este guión gráfico.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los valores de enumeración de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior
trans-unit.target: Mediante el campo Compose de HandoffBehavior

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose?displayProperty=nameWithType>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Al aplicar un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> a una propiedad mediante el uso de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose?displayProperty=nameWithType>, cualquier <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objetos asociados anteriormente a esa propiedad siguen consumiendo recursos del sistema; el sistema de temporización no quita estos relojes automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar problemas de rendimiento cuando se aplica un gran número de relojes con <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, debe quitar los relojes de composición de la propiedad animada cuando se hayan completado.

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock:
trans-unit.target: Hay varias maneras de quitar un reloj:

trans-unit.source: To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: Para quitar todos los relojes de una propiedad, utilice la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> método del objeto animado.

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Especifique la propiedad que se está animada como el primer parámetro, y `null` como el segundo.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: De este modo, se quitarán todos los relojes de animación de la propiedad.

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: Para quitar un determinado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> en una lista de relojes, use la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> para recuperar un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, a continuación, llame a la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> método de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Esto se hace normalmente en el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> controlador de eventos para un reloj.

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que los relojes de raíz única pueden controlarse mediante una <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> propiedad de un reloj secundario devuelve `null`.

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta también que la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> eventos no se llama si la duración efectiva del reloj es para siempre.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En ese caso, el usuario debe determinar cuándo se debe llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Este problema se produce principalmente en las animaciones de objetos que tienen un período de duración prolongado.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Si un objeto se han recopilado, sus relojes también se desconectan y el recolector.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de los objetos de reloj, consulte [animación y temporización información general del sistema](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el nombre del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: By naming the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> object, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> can be controlled after it is started.
trans-unit.target: Si asigna un nombre al objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />, se puede controlar el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> una vez iniciado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise interactively control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> to reference this name.
trans-unit.target: Para poder poner en pausa, reanudar o, en caso contrario, controlar interactivamente un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, establezca el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propiedad de su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> y usar un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> para hacer referencia a este nombre.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively affected after it is begun; furthermore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> ends or enters its Fill period, the animation clocks are disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> no se especifica, el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> no puede verse afectado de forma interactiva después de que se ha iniciado; Además, cuando la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> finaliza o entra en su período de relleno, la animación se eliminan los relojes.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vea [Cómo: utilizar desencadenadores de eventos para controlar un guión gráfico después de que se inicia](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obtener más información.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> starts.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> que inicia este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> starts.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> que inicia el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard" />.
